text:
Big B is one of the most popular stars on social media. Bollywood star Amitabh Bachchan has said the social media is the modern generation atomic bomb as users can easily voice their opinions and have the capability to give a perspective to any move be it political or otherwise.
Amitabh, who has a following of over 36.9 million followers on Twitter, 12.6 million on Instagram and over 30 million likes on his official Facebook account, took to his blog on Thursday night to voice his opinion on social media.
He wrote: “The social media is the modern generation atomic bomb. It has the capacity to exercise a chilling response to the enemy; bringing them down to their knees, seeking pardon.
bccl
Over 7 billion humans in the Universe now have opinion and voice and capability to give a perspective to any move, political or otherwise. And see it being spread through the medium, it employs across the continents of habituated being... It is a scary ultimatum.”

“Fall prey to it dear ones ; be not the choice I see, Consider, regard assuage the contents before it be. We live in maximum consumption, never ever before Guard shield protect thy words, just as they would assure,” he further wrote on his blog.

Big B is not the only one who has spoken about the negative side of social media. Stars like Deepika Padukone, Malaika Arora, Anushka Sharma and Shahid Kapoor too have time and again shared their thoughts about social media in the past. Like, talking about social media, Anushka had said,

“Social media is not the right place to gauge criticism because a lot of faceless people have an opinion on your life. There is a lot of vested interest involved, as a public figure I’m prepared for it and don’t get affected.”
